original_text: Jehu will put to death any who escape the sword of Hazael, and Elisha will put to death any who escape the sword of Jehu.
korean_text: 하사엘의 칼을 피하는 자를 예후가 죽일 것이요 예후의 칼을 피하는 자를 엘리사가 죽이리라

sentences.original_text: any who escape the sword of Hazael
and Elisha will put to death
any who escape the sword of Jehu
